name: Premium Wireless Headphones
description: High-quality wireless headphones with noise cancellation, perfect for music lovers and professionals. Features include 30-hour battery life, premium sound quality, and comfortable over-ear design.

name: Organic Cotton T-Shirt
description: Comfortable and eco-friendly t-shirt made from 100% organic cotton. Available in multiple colors, this t-shirt is perfect for everyday wear and is gentle on sensitive skin.

name: Smart Fitness Watch
description: Advanced fitness tracking watch with heart rate monitoring, GPS, and sleep tracking. Water-resistant design with 7-day battery life and smartphone connectivity for notifications.

name: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
description: Durable 32oz water bottle made from food-grade stainless steel. Keeps drinks cold for 24 hours and hot for 12 hours. Perfect for outdoor activities and daily hydration.

name: Wireless Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with 360-degree sound and 20-hour battery life. Waterproof design perfect for outdoor use and parties. Connects to any Bluetooth device.

name: Leather Crossbody Bag
description: Stylish and practical crossbody bag made from genuine leather. Features multiple compartments, adjustable strap, and classic design perfect for everyday use and travel.

name: Portable Coffee Maker
description: Compact coffee maker perfect for travel and small spaces. Brews single cups of coffee in minutes with adjustable strength settings and easy cleanup.

name: Yoga Mat Premium
description: High-quality yoga mat with excellent grip and cushioning. Made from eco-friendly materials, perfect for yoga, pilates, and fitness activities. Includes carrying strap.

name: Wireless Charging Pad
description: Fast wireless charging pad compatible with all Qi-enabled devices. Sleek design with LED indicator and non-slip base. Charges phones, earbuds, and smartwatches.

name: Organic Face Moisturizer
description: Natural face moisturizer made with organic ingredients including aloe vera and jojoba oil. Suitable for all skin types, provides long-lasting hydration without greasy residue.

name: Smart Home Security Camera
description: 1080p HD security camera with night vision and motion detection. Connects to WiFi for remote monitoring, includes two-way audio and cloud storage options.
